svg.title: Ekassa
svg.desc: Ekassa.eu is an online investment platform, launched in May 2018 but part of an international finance group which has been operating since 2012. Company is focused on investing in P2P consumer loans issued by trusted lending partners in Poland one of the fastest-growing areas of finance in Europe. Our new online technologies allow us to offer our clients higher returns compared to other investment classes such as saving accounts.
